name: Brian Gleeson
description: On October 18, 2018, it was announced that Gleeson would be joining the cast for an unspecified role in the upcomingSeries 5ofPeaky Blinders.This role was later confirmed asJimmy McCavern, leader of the Billy Boys.

name: Sam Neill
description: Sam NeillGeneral InformationDate of BirthSeptember 14, 1947 (age 73)Place of BirthOmagh, Co. Tyrone, Northern IrelandRoleChester CampbellSam Neilwas born in Northern Ireland to an English mother and New Zealand-born father. His notable roles include Dr. Alan Grant in theJurassic Parkfilms, Dr. William Weir inEvent Horizonand Hec in Hunt for theWilderpeople.

name: Sam Claflin
description: Sam ClaflinDate of BirthJune 27, 1986Birth placeChiswick, London, EnglandRoleOswald MosleyAppeared in5Sam Claflinis an English actor. who is best known for portrayingFinnick OdairinThe Hunger Gamesfilm series. He also portrayedPhilip SwiftinPirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger TidesandWill TraynorinMe Before You.

name: Graeme Hawley
description: Graeme Hawleyis an English actor known for his role as John Stape in the British soapCoronation Street,Kappatoo(1990), andThe Forsyte Saga(2002). Hawley playsNiall DevlininPeaky Blinders.

name: Kunjue Li
description: Kunjue LiGeneral InformationPlace of BirthDanling, Sichuan, ChinaRoleChinnKunjue Liis a Chinese actress and producer, known for BBC'sRipper Street (2013),Peaky Blinders, mini-seriesOne Child (2014), Ancient Assassins,Razors: The Return of Jack the Ripper (2016)andMy Best Friend's Wedding (2016).She playsChinninPeaky Blinders.

name: Adam Lawrence
description: Adam LawrenceGeneral InformationDate of BirthJanuary 25, 1991Place of BirthBirmingham, England, UKRolePolly's LoverAdam Lawrenceis an English actor who was born and raised in Birmingham. His debut film appearance saw him long listed for a BIFA Award for 'Most Promising Newcomer' for the role Billy Duffy inEngland Is Mine. His other credits include roles inThe Last Witness (2018)andLadders (2015).He playsPolly's Lover inPeaky Blinders.

name: Aimee-Ffion Edwards
description: Aimee-Ffion EdwardsGeneral InformationDate of BirthNovember 21, 1987 (age 30)Place of BirthNewport, Wales, United KingdomRoleEsme ShelbyAimee-Ffion Edwardsis a Welsh actress from Newport, Wales and a stone cold Fox . She is perhaps best known for playing Sketch inSkins,Esme ShelbyinPeaky Blinders.

name: Helen McCrory
description: Helen McCroryGeneral InformationDate of BirthAugust 17, 1968Place of BirthLondon, EnglandDate of DeathApril 16, 2021 (age 52)Place of DeathLondon, EnglandRoleAunt PollyHelen Elizabeth McCrory, OBE was an English actress, whose role in Peaky Blinders is that ofPolly Gray.

name: Wendy Nottingham
description: Wendy NottinghamGeneral InformationRoleMarySeasons3Wendy Nottinghamis a British actress who portraysMaryonPeaky Blinders. She is known for her roles inNotes on a Scandal(2006),Topsy-Turvy(1999), andAtonement(2007).

name: Ned Dennehy
description: Ned DennehyGeneral InformationDate of Birth8 December 1965 (age 52)RoleCharlie StrongNed Dennehyis an Irish actor in British and Irish films and television who playsCharlie Strong. Other credits include Radnor inBlitz (2011)andHermit Jacob inThe Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death (2014).
